ARABIC: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا۟ أَنَّا خَلَقْنَا لَهُم مِّمَّا عَمِلَتْ أَيْدِينَآ أَنْعَٰمًا فَهُمْ لَهَا مَٰلِكُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Have they not seen how We created for them, by Our own handiwork, livestock which are under their control?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Do they not see the cattle among things We have fashioned by Our power, which they own,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Do they not see Our handiwork: We created for them cattle which they own?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Have they not seen what We have created from the labor of Our own hands? We have given them cattle.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Did they not see that We have created animals for them from Our handiwork, so they are their owners?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Do they not see that We have created for them of what Our Hands have fashioned, the cattle, so that they are their owners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Do they not see that We have created cattle for them, out of what Our hands have wrought, so they are their masters?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Have they not seen how that We have created for them of that Our hands wrought cattle that they own?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Have they not seen how We have created for them of Our handiwork the cattle, so that they are their owners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Do they not see that, among the things which Our hands have fashioned, We have created for them cattle of which they are the masters,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Observe they not that We have created for them, of that which Our hands have worked, cattle: so that they are their owners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Have they not seen that We have created for them—of what Our hands have worked—cattle, so they have become their masters?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: See they not that it is We Who have created for them - among the things which Our hands have fashioned - cattle, which are under their dominion?-
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Do they not see that We have created for them of what Our Hands have created, the cattle, so that they are their owners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Have they not seen how We have created for them the cattle they master with Our Hands?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Have they not seen that We created for them, of Our Handiwork, livestock that they own?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Do they not see that We have created for them from what Our hands have made, grazing livestock, and [then] they are their owners?
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:71] Or, have they not seen, have they [not] realised (the interrogative is meant as an affirmative, and the wāw inserted therein [in a-wa-lam] is for supplementation) that We have created for them, and for all human beings, of what Our hands worked, [of] what We have made without any partner or helper, cattle, namely, camels, cows and sheep, so that they are their owners?, masters [controlling them].
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Have they not seen) have they not been informed (how We have created for them) for the people of Mecca (of Our handiwork) by means of Our power (the cattle, so that they are their owners) and controllers,
